title: Immune System Boosting Crystals
author: Caro's Crystal Cove
description: Amethyst is a natural tranquilizer, promoting deep peace and reducing stress. Stress is toxic and is known to weaken your immune system. Amethyst is also a cleansing stone and enhances sleep quality.
